list.abs: envious 嫉妒的enviously 羡慕地environ 包围
公共英语等级考试单词表第4级 - 新月空中英语 ... engagement 诺言,约会,婚约 enviously 羡慕地；妒忌地 epicenter 中心.
Every year we gaze enviously at the lists of the richest people in world ., 每年我们都羡慕的目光在名单的最富有的人的世界.

he went onto describe how magnificent the Dragon Palace was , with its exotic delicacies.The uncle enviously begged , " I'm nearly in the grave , and I've never even seen the Dragon Palace .叔叔羡慕得不断央求他：“我老得快进棺材了，也没见识过龙宫，你就让我去玩一会吧！”

means.word_mean: 1. a feeling of grudging admiration and desire to have something possessed by another
